Hello {!ClientCase__c.PrimaryClient__c},
I hope this message finds you well.
We are pleased to inform you that the updated Action Plan agreement from your recent counseling session is now available for your review and signature.
Action Plan Details:
Purpose: [Brief description of the purpose or objectives of the Action Plan]
Key Objectives: [List key objectives or actions planned]
Next Steps: [Any additional information about what to do next]
Please log in to your portal account to review the document and electronically sign it at your earliest convenience.
If you have any questions or need further clarification regarding the Action Plan, please feel free to reach out to us.
Thank you,
{!User.Name}
{!User.Title}
{!User.Email}
